name: Fly Swatter (jtnoble)
description:
You play as a cat wanting to protect his milk! Move up and down the lanes to protect your milk from Flies, Bees, and even Spiders!

How To Play:

- Arrow Keys Up and Down, or The "W" and "S" keys to move

- Touchscreen support for mobile devices (Does not support all aspect ratios)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project was created for submission to the Ben Bonk Game Jam #4: https://itch.io/jam/benbonk-game-jam-4

Albeit very rarely, I do upload to YouTube! Subscribe at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq1f0e8iUxnuucbbQqfsN6g

Thank you for playing my game!
